books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: With the return of a killer who was presumed dead, the San Francisco detective Lindsay Boxer and the Women’s Murder Club take action.
books.name: UNLUCKY 13

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Lucas Davenport investigates when multiple bodies are found in the middle of the Minnesota cornfields.
books.name: FIELD OF PREY

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: As the government hit man Will Robie and his partner, Jessica Reel, prepare for a mission, they face a new adversary.
books.name: THE TARGET

books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by Richard Paul Evans
books.description: In the fifth and final book of the “Walk” series, Alan reaches Key West.
books.name: WALKING ON WATER

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Maya Banks
books.description: Can Kylie, a victim of childhood violence and abuse, now give up total control and submit to a man? Book 2 of the Surrender trilogy.
books.name: GIVING IN

books.author: by Greg Iles
books.description: Penn Cage, a former prosecutor in Natchez, Miss., delves into the secrets of his father, a doctor who has been accused of murdering an African-American nurse.
books.name: NATCHEZ BURNING

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A freelance writer who may have witnessed a murder-suicide joins the dead man’s brother to learn what happened.
books.name: THE COLLECTOR

books.author: by Mia Sheridan
books.description: A woman looking for peace in a sleepy Maine town instead finds an isolated man with a secret agony of his own; a Sign of Love novel.
books.name: ARCHER'S VOICE

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: The symbologist Robert Langdon, on the run in Florence, must decipher a series of codes created by a Dante-loving scientist.
books.name: INFERNO

books.author: by Abbi Glines
books.description: Rush Finlay’s side of the story of how he and Blaire Wynn fell in love; a Rosemary Beach novel.
books.name: RUSH TOO FAR

books.author: by Christina Baker Kline
books.description: A historical novel about orphans swept off the streets of New York and sent to the Midwest in the 1920s.
books.name: ORPHAN TRAIN

books.author: by J.S. Scott, M. Malone and others
books.description: Alpha males, bad boys and billionaires: a set of 10 romances.
books.name: BEYOND DESIRE COLLECTION

books.author: by John Lescroart
books.description: Dismas Hardy and Abe Glitsky hunt for clues about a woman who has gone missing.
books.name: THE KEEPER
